item.description:
Our very own Pam Slayton has been accepted to the Order of St. Esclarmonde, a lay order or monks and nuns. She will be taking her vows May 24th and has been gracious enough to allow the Narthex to take part in the ceremony. May 24th is also the feast day for our patron, St. Sarah the Egyptian. What a great day!

I found a good place! and if there are no objections I think 7PM can be official.

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: Pam's Vows for the Order of St. Esclarmonde
